Text: CalendarMEMBERS Attached is your copy of our Calendar of Events You will see me email more details out about these classes and brown bags through out the year I am also attaching a registration form for anyone who knows they would like to attend a class now The form is generic so please complete it with details regarding the class name and dates Have a great day Lana BelnoskeMoore Calendardoc Registration formdoc Calendardoc Registration formdoc

Association NameTO All Members of NESA and HEA It has been brought to our attention that not everyone is aware that we are not going to be using the name National Energy Association NEA now that NESA and HEA have agreed to merge effective A press release was prepared and distributed on As we havent seen a copy in any media outlets and no one has told us that theyve see it either were attaching a copy of the draft press release that was sent out for your files We are now NESAHEA Thats pronounced NE sa H E A the slash is silent HEA Approves MergerDraftdoc PS Stay tuned for more information regarding the merger HEA Approves MergerDraftdoc

Association NameTO All Members of NESA and HEA It has been brought to our attention that not everyone is aware that we are not going to be using the name National Energy Association NEA now that NESA and HEA have agreed to merge effective A press release was prepared and distributed on As we havent seen a copy in any media outlets and no one has told us that theyve see it either were attaching a copy of the draft press release that was sent out for your files We are now NESAHEA Thats pronounced NE sa H E A the slash is silent HEA Approves MergerDraftdoc PS Stay tuned for more information regarding the merger HEA Approves MergerDraftdoc

Board Nominations and Annual Meeting informationqualifying nominations for NESAs Board of Directors have been received from the general membership Therefore the following five individuals will to the membership via ballot in early August Timothy J Janisse Vice President Human Resources Administration Engage Energy US LP Rodney Pennington Principal The Pendulum Group Denise Pocius Manager Gas Trading Public Service Electric Gas Co Ben Reese Vice President Reliant Energy Retail Inc A copy of the NESA rd Annual Meeting program is attached for your information It contains a registration form in case you plan to attend Simply print the registration form complete it and return it to NESA Since this program was printed weve had a few changes For your information they are as follows Christopher Law director of North American Market Development for GE MicroGen has been added to the program Chris is currently responsible for the commercial introduction of GEs new PEM Fuel Cell product lines and will be joining us to give the audience an overview of the fuel cell market Richard G DeWolf senior vice president Ziff Energy Group will replace Paul Ziff CEO Ziff Energy Group Beth Armstrong senior vice president Strategic Planning Marketing Aquila Energy will replace Mark Cook vice president Aquila Energy and Jan Roberts senior coordinator Project DevelopmentNorthern Area Williams Gas PipelinesTransco will replace Jamie Craddock manager Project Development Williams Gas PipelinesTransco on the true merchant plants panel discussion We look forward to seeing you in Hilton Head NESA Ann Mtg Brochurepdf NESA Ann Mtg Brochurepdf

NESA ANNUAL MEETINGNESA rd ANNUAL MEETING ADVANCE REGISTRATION DEADLINE AUGUST Sign up today to save Attached below for your review is a copy of the Annual Meeting program you will need Adobe Acrobat to view the brochure which you can download from our website at wwwnesanetorg If you have problems with the attached file please contact NESA Headquarters at and we will be happy to forward the brochure via fax or mail PASS IT ON The Low Down in the Low Country you can win COMPLIMENTARY LODGING during your stay in Hilton Head NESA encourages and appreciates you taking a moment to forward the Annual Meeting brochure to your coworkers and industry colleagues The member who sponsors the most meeting delegates will receive their accommodations at They Hyatt Regency Hilton Head compliments of NESA Ask potential delegates to note YOUR NAME as their sponsor somewhere on the Annual Meeting Registration Form to receive proper credit CASH PRIZES will be awarded to the winners of NESAs Hole Scramble Golf Tournament per person for the First Place Team per person for the Second Place Team and per person for the Third Place Team Additionally per person for Competition Holes ClosesttothePin and Longest Drive for men and women will be awarded The Golf Tournament will take place Thursday on the Robert Trent Jones Course at Palmetto Dunes AIRPORT SHUTTLES can be arranged through Low Country Adventures by calling or emailing at least hours prior to arrival Round trip from Savannah is per person Round trip from Hilton Head is per person LATE ARRIVALS on Wednesday September will be accommodated by extended registration hours prior to the Opening Reception Please join us at the NESA Registration table located on the Basshead Deck as soon as you arrive Please note the following changes to the original published program they are as follows Thursday September Panel Discussion Hub Services Retraction of previous replacement speaker Mark D Cook Vice President of The Exchange Center Aquila Energy Marketing remains on the program Risk Management Steve Brown Director of Credit Southern Company has been added to the panel Please contact NESA Headquarters at with questions or for additional information We look forward to welcoming you to Hilton Head in September NESA Brochurepdf NESA Brochurepdf

NESA Annual Meeting Brochure Delegate ListNESA rd ANNUAL MEETING ADVANCE REGISTRATION DEADLINE FRIDAY AUGUST Sign up today Attached below for your review is a copy of the Annual Meeting program you will need Adobe Acrobat to view the brochure which you can download from our website at wwwnesanetorg AIRFARE DISCOUNTS are available on Continental Airlines official meeting airline check page for details Low fares can also be found on Delta and United into Savannah GA AIRPORT SHUTTLES can be arranged through Low Country Adventures by calling or emailing at least hours prior to arrival Round trip from Savannah is per person Round trip from Hilton Head is per person DELEGATE REGISTRATION LIST is attached below in an Excel worksheet for your review Please contact NESA Headquarters if you have problems opening the file or to request an updated list LATE ARRIVALS on Wednesday September will be accommodated by extended registration hours prior to the Opening Reception Please join us at the NESA Registration table located on the Basshead Deck as soon as you arrive Please contact NESA Headquarters at with questions or for additional information Our fax number is dont delay fax your delegate registration form for the annual meeting to NESA today We look forward to welcoming you to Hilton Head in September NESA Brochurepdf Annual Meeting Delegatesxls NESA Brochurepdf Annual Meeting Delegatesxls

NESA Annual Mtg Brochure Updated Delegate List Cc NESA rd ANNUAL MEETING LAST CHANCE to REGISTER Sign up today Attached below for your review is a copy of the Annual Meeting program you will need Adobe Acrobat to view the brochure which you can download from our website at wwwnesanetorg AIRFARE DISCOUNTS are available on Continental Airlines official meeting airline check page for details Low fares can also be found on Delta and United into Savannah GA AIRPORT SHUTTLES can be arranged through Low Country Adventures by calling or emailing at least hours prior to arrival Round trip from Savannah is per person Round trip from Hilton Head is per person CPE CREDIT is available for NESAs rd Annual Meeting you can earn credit hours by attending the General Sessions on Thursday and Friday DELEGATE REGISTRATION LIST is attached below in an Excel worksheet for your review Please contact NESA Headquarters if you have problems opening the file or to request an updated list LATE ARRIVALS on Wednesday September will be accommodated by extended registration hours prior to the Opening Reception Please join us at the NESA Registration table located on the Basshead Deck as soon as you arrive Please contact NESA Headquarters at with questions or for additional information Our fax number is dont delay fax your delegate registration form for the annual meeting to NESA today We look forward to welcoming you to Hilton Head in September Best Regards Tracy Cummins Director of Conventions Expositions NESA Brochurepdf Annual Meeting Delegatesxls NESA Brochurepdf Annual Meeting Delegatesxls

HEA Sports Tournamentis still room available for NESA members to participate in the HEAs th Annual Sports Tournament on Monday October at the Woodlands Country Club This event is only two weeks away so click on the link below and register today publicsportscoverdoc Thanks a lot

HEAs th Annual Chili CookoffNESA Members Its that time again and youre invited HEAs last event of the millennium will be held November Tuesday at Garden in the Heights Feagan from pm pm for HEANESA Members for NonMember Guests Admission guarantees you some of the industrys best chili and all the beer you need to wash it down Or if you can stand the competition put your own team together and try for Best Chili and Best Presentation Awards per team includes fees for members per team There is room for teams only so dont delay Rules are attached To register return this email or print it off and fax to as soon as possible This is a fun event dont miss it MEMBER NAME COMPANY GUEST NAME COMPANY CREDIT CARD EXPIRATION DATE TEAM NAME TEAM MEMBERS If you cant open the attachment try the link below Thanks If you did not receive the attached file or it was corrupted you can find it at publicChili Cookoff Rulesdoc Chili Cookoff Rulesdoc Chili Cookoff Rulesdoc

NESA Annual Mtg Brochure Updated Delegate List Cc NESA rd ANNUAL MEETING LAST CHANCE to REGISTER Sign up today Attached below for your review is a copy of the Annual Meeting program you will need Adobe Acrobat to view the brochure which you can download from our website at wwwnesanetorg AIRFARE DISCOUNTS are available on Continental Airlines official meeting airline check page for details Low fares can also be found on Delta and United into Savannah GA AIRPORT SHUTTLES can be arranged through Low Country Adventures by calling or emailing at least hours prior to arrival Round trip from Savannah is per person Round trip from Hilton Head is per person CPE CREDIT is available for NESAs rd Annual Meeting you can earn credit hours by attending the General Sessions on Thursday and Friday DELEGATE REGISTRATION LIST is attached below in an Excel worksheet for your review Please contact NESA Headquarters if you have problems opening the file or to request an updated list LATE ARRIVALS on Wednesday September will be accommodated by extended registration hours prior to the Opening Reception Please join us at the NESA Registration table located on the Basshead Deck as soon as you arrive Please contact NESA Headquarters at with questions or for additional information Our fax number is dont delay fax your delegate registration form for the annual meeting to NESA today We look forward to welcoming you to Hilton Head in September Best Regards Tracy Cummins Director of Conventions Expositions NESA Brochurepdf Annual Meeting Delegatesxls NESA Brochurepdf Annual Meeting Delegatesxls
